from com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.DailyStudentAttendance dailyStudentAttendance where dailyStudentAttendance.studentId = ? and dailyStudentAttendance.date = ?
FROM com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.DailyStudentAttendance dailyStudentAttendance WHERE dailyStudentAttendance.studentId = ? AND dailyStudentAttendance.date BETWEEN ? AND ?
